content: cats are my favorite animals and so i made a tiny sitting amigurumi cat that you can attach to a keychain or just keep as a little talisman all you need to know to crochet this little cat is how to single_crochet make a magic_ring and invisible decreases with single_crochet materials and tools you need * dk / light worsted weight cotton yarn for example paintbox cotton dk in stormy grey 405 or melon sorbet 417 * 2 5mm / c-2 or b-1 crochet hook * 5mm / 0 2″ safety eyes * fiberfill * darning needle / tapestry needle * large eyed sewing needle * light pink embroidery floss * stitch marker * scissors * small pliers optional on my blog you can find the written pattern as well as the video tutorial if you prefer crocheting along with me thank you so much for visiting i hope you enjoy my free pattern
